title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-8.3 - Pre-application analysis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-8.3 - Pre-application analysis

State Regulations

Prior to submitting a permit application, the facility
owner or operator must comply with the requirements of section
231-12.3
(pre-application analysis
for Subparts 231-7 and 231-8) of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-8.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
